title: FedericoExbita
author: FedericoExbita
content: Today, thanks to technological growth, cryptocurrencies have been part of our daily lives as investors. More and more people are interested in this market and therefore the creation of new cryptocurrency exchanges has become a profitable and attractive business.In recent years, the exchange market has experienced exponential growth. According to data from CoinMarketCap, in 2016 there were around 50 exchanges around the world, while today there are more than 300. This increase is largely due to the increased interest in cryptocurrencies and the demand for safe and secure exchange services. reliable.In this context, Exbita.com offers the opportunity and simplicity for any enterprising person to launch their white-label exchange without neglecting the most important points, since they take care of security and maintenance, as well as customization in if necessary.In addition, Exbita has packages that include landing page + exchange platform + Android / Ios platform for less than $2,000, which makes it the cheapest service on the market. It is important to mention that Exbita uses its own nodes and only uses third-party APIs to generate liquidity from exchanges such as Binance, which guarantees the stability and security of the platform.This is not something easy and that is why we offer this service using the highest security standards and technologies such as:VUE.JS, LARAVEL, PHP, JS, ETCYou can see a live demo at https://demo.exbita.comYou can contact us via info@exbita.com or +54 3446 202908 or +90 535 062 95 81 (WhatsApp) we will help you in the process and we will provide you with a unique service.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: FedericoExbita on May 03, 2023, 12:47:22 PMwe will help you in the process and we will provide you with a unique service.Maybe someone here still does not understand what you offer, because in the title thread, you offer a service that builds an exchange, but in your point thread you seem to endorse your already exchanged, So what are you actually selling?. In this case, when I look at your demo exchange, we must register to try the demo which I think is not necessary because is still beta, In my experience when try the demo, we don't need to create an account, they even give free testnet coin to try the exchange. so, the experimenter will be free to find any bug.

comments.author: FedericoExbita
comments.body: Hello Â , first of all I am sorry for the confusion that the message itself could have generated. Actually what we offer is a white-label script that allows users to launch their own cryptocurrency exchange, we are currently working on launching a new demo with new themes available and we will take very seriously the consideration of creating and offering a TEST account. Although currently there are two buttons that say "log in as Admin" or "log in as User" thank you!In the next few hours we will launch the demo of the new theme that you can see in the link https://demo-light.exbita.com/market/BTC-USD (currently blocked and limited by a firewall)
